description:
Are you an online instructor or coach? If so I've got a very important message for you.

You see, the online teaching landscape is changing and if you don't get onboard you could very well be left behind.

Let me explain.

In recent times, exciting new platforms such as Blab and Periscope have transformed the way we, as online instructors and coaches, interact with our students or coaching clients.

Already a trend is developing amongst Udemy instructors. Many instructors are embracing Blab to not only coach and instruct their students, but also promote their courses and build their online teaching business.

Blab is an amazing platform with seemingly endless possibilities for online instructors and coaches. Here are just a few ways to can use Blab -

  • Expert interviews
  • Live Q&A sessions
  • "Hot Seat" coaching sessions
  • Focus sessions

What's more you can choose to record the session. You will then be emailed links to the audio and video files to use as you please.

You now have content that you can add to your course as bonus material or even use as Podcast episodes.

More importantly you will gather key insights into what your students and followers really need and want.

Identify areas of your course material that can be improved with the introduction on new lectures and resources, or you may even discover the need for a whole new course based on comments and feedback received during the Blab session.

Seriously, this is a powerful tool that every online instructor and coach must embrace.

Discover how you can use Blab to -

  • Connect with your students in new and exciting ways
  • Provide value and create content you can repurpose in a number of ways
  • Position yourself as an expert and promote your courses to prospective students
  • Create additional income streams by linking to affiliate links and related products and services
  • Get more course enrollments or fill your coaching programs.

Plus you have absolutely nothing to lose. Your purchase is covered by Udemy's 100% 30 day, no questions asked money back guarantee.

So what are you waiting for?

Embrace Blab today. Build a tribe of happy, satisfied students.

This is the way of the future. Students will come to expect this level of accessibility from their online instructors.

Are you ready? Let's go!
title: Blab For Online Instructors and Coaches
